document_data.name: ''Staff of Arcane Blessing''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''staff of arcane blessing''''' was a [[magic]] staff associated with the goddess of [[magic]] [[Mystra]] that could be found in the Realms ''circa'' the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The staff emanated an aura of calmness and relaxation.
document_data.Powers:
The wielder of a ''staff of arcane blessing'' was granted ''Mystra's blessing'', a boon that bolstered their spellcasting ability, prowess in combat, along with their natural defenses.

They were also granted the ability to bestow a lesser ''[[bless|blessing]]'' upon their companions or others.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Lenore De Hurst]], a cleric of Mystra that dwelled within the [[Arcane Tower]] in the [[Underdark]].
